Table of Contents

Interface IArticleTagService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Service interface for managing article-tag relationships. Provides business logic for tagging operations, batch processing, retrieval, statistics, rule-based tagging, maintenance, and event notifications.

public interface IArticleTagService

Remarks

This service coordinates tagging workflows between articles and tags, ensuring atomicity, validation, and proper event raising for UI reactivity and rule engine integration.

All methods return DTOs instead of entities to maintain separation of concerns and prevent leaking persistence details to the presentation layer.

Methods

ApplyRuleTaggingAsync(int, IEnumerable<int>, IEnumerable<int>, double, CancellationToken)

Applies a set of tags to multiple articles as a result of a rule execution.

Task<int> ApplyRuleTaggingAsync(int ruleId, IEnumerable<int> articleIds, IEnumerable<int> tagIds, double confidence = 0.8, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

ruleId int

The unique identifier of the rule that triggered the tagging.

articleIds IEnumerable<int>

Collection of article IDs to tag.

tagIds IEnumerable<int>

Collection of tag IDs to apply.

confidence double

Confidence score for auto-tagging.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

The total number of new tag associations created.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if ruleId is less than or equal to 0, or confidence out of range.

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if articleIds or tagIds is null.

TagArticleAsync(int, int, string, int?, double?, CancellationToken)

Associates a single tag with an article.

Task<bool> TagArticleAsync(int articleId, int tagId, string appliedBy = "user", int? ruleId = null, double? confidence = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

articleId int

The unique identifier of the article.

tagId int

The unique identifier of the tag.

appliedBy string

Source of the tagging (user, rule, system).

ruleId int?

Optional ID of the rule that triggered the tagging.

confidence double?

Optional confidence score (0.0â€“1.0) for auto-tagging.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<bool>

True if the tag was successfully applied; false if already exists.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if articleId or tagId is less than or equal to 0, or confidence is out of range.

ArgumentException

Thrown if appliedBy is null or whitespace.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if the specified article or tag does not exist.

Events

OnArticleTagged

Event raised after a tag is successfully applied to an article.

event EventHandler<ArticleTaggedEventArgs> OnArticleTagged

Event Type
